neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Media tutorials
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: Media tutorials explains usage of Neurotechnology Media library API.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]CreateWsq[/b] - demonstrates WSQ format image creation from another image.[br] [b]ReadAudioFromDevice[/b] - demonstrates capturing sound from device.[br] [b]ReadAudio[/b] - demonstrates reading sound from specified filename or url.[br] [b]ReadVideoFromDevice[/b] - demonstrates capturing frames from device.[br] [b]ReadVideo[/b] - demonstrates reading frames from specified filename or url.[br] [b]ShowImageInfo[/b] - displays information about an image.[br] [b]WsqToNImage[/b] - demonstrates WSQ to NImage conversion.[br]
